2076070.name: Marble Smashers
2076070.description:
Marble Smashers is a 3D fighting game for 2-4 players where the goal is to knock out your opponents off the stage and be the last one standing. You must attack other opponents to knock them away, but watch out! The more you get attacked, the easier it is to be thrown off. In each stage, you may find objects that help you with your objective.

Battle your friends face-to-face in local play sessions, or fight players around the world in online matches!

Join our Discord server

Customize your Marble

Unleash your creativity, personalize your Marble. The game's customization system allows players to modify their Marbles' cosmetics and colors. Choose from a wide range of options to create a unique Marble that reflects your style and personality. Stand out on the battlefield and show off your distinctive Marble to your opponents!

Multiple unique stages

Experience a variety of captivating stages. Each stage presents a different environment with its own set of challenges and opportunities. Make strategic use of stage-specific objects and your move set to gain an edge over your opponents.
